sentences.sentence: I had to go all "exorcist" to get her to even pick up the phone.
sentences.translation: 我不得不让所有“招魂者”去找她，甚至去打电话。

sentences.sentence: Kent librarian wants an exorcist called in to sort out a haunted lavatory.
sentences.translation: (英国)肯特郡一名图书馆员想请驱魔大师来解决厕所闹鬼的问题。
